title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.8 - Safeguarding information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.8 - Safeguarding information

State Regulations

The social services district shall safeguard the use and
disclosure of information on applicants for and recipients of services in
accordance with Part 357 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
403.8

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
